bike.description: A2-SL custom-butted alloy w/ shaped top tube & integrated 1 1/4"L tapered head tube, oversized 34.9mm round seat tube, PIIS BB-86 shell, double water bottle mounts
sizes: XS/S (48cm), S (50cm), S/M (52cm), M (54cm), M/L (56cm), L (58cm), XL (60cm)

components.description: A2-SL custom-butted alloy, forged road dropout w/ replaceable derailleur hanger
FC-440 carbon monocoque w/ tapered steerer & alloy dropout
Shimano 105 STI shifter/brake combo, 20-speed Flight Deck compatible
Oval 330 aero alloy, 30mm rims, DT Swiss Champion spokes, 20/24H, precision ground hubs
1 1/8"U - 1 1/4"L Sealed cartridge bearing w/ alloy top cover
Selle Italia X1 w/ FeC alloy rails
